channel.title: Staff contactability 2.0
channel.description:
Hello, i dont know about you, but often when i need to contact a staff member in a [b]timely fashion[/b], it is somewhat difficult
surely it is common sense that staff should appear in IRC? mopar often does, but is not always on irc when browsing the forums, which can be a tad irritating :( pwnd and the un-named are the only other staff to frequent IRC (though pwnd can be a tad aggro sometimes l0l)
I propose that you actually make an effort, if you really give a damn about this community, join IRC and make yourselves avaliable
note: dont lock this just because you are one of the people i am talking about
edit: lol i fixt a smilie

item.title: Staff contactability 2.0
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Kmb, post:49, topic:140403”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=192568.msg1746955#msg1746955 date=1189475830]
Really, the solution is more/better staff.
[/quote]
I think the solution is less/better members.[/quote]
Touche’.

I prefer Kmb’s solution. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Staff contactability 2.0
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

goatee:

I nominate Mopman! "He mops up all your naughty violations insert cheesey smile and wink "

That’s right, I mop up all your naughty cheesey “violations”…

[quote=“Kmb, post:49, topic:140403”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=192568.msg1746955#msg1746955 date=1189475830]
Really, the solution is more/better staff.
[/quote]
I think the solution is less/better members.[/quote]

I’m not quite sure if that was a dig at me, or not. Either way, I agree in a way, although realistically, neither of them are going to happen.

Read full topic

item.description:

Starblaster100, I think i pmed u twice through out the past like 1 month or even more and u havent responded…so ya

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:34, topic:140403”][quote author=Starblaster100 link=topic=192568.msg1732048#msg1732048 date=1188931958]
All Staff have unlimited PM storage space.

You either use it, or you stop complaining.

thug, we’ve moved on
[/quote]
The moparscape moderators not.
Moparisthebest tried giving us 1000 messages space.
But it didn’t work.
When I’m full it says.

100 messages,
10% full.[/quote]

Fixed

I am on MSN a lot actually, and if you need to talk to me or get in contact with me (even though I am not on the forums as much anymore), you can still do so through MSN.

If you need to get in contact with me, then PM me or message me on MSN.

item.title: Staff contactability 2.0
item.dc:creator: @sicarius99 sicarius99
item.description:
@sicarius99 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:36, topic:140403”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=192568.msg1732038#msg1732038 date=1188931549]
surely it is common sense that staff should appear in IRC? mopar often does, but is not always on irc when browsing the forums, which can be a tad irritating pwnd and the un-named are the only other staff to frequent IRC (though pwnd can be a tad aggro sometimes l0l)
[/quote]

There are a few reasons why I browse the forums while not joining IRC sometimes.

  1. My homepage is here, so while doing something else with firefox I will appear online for 15 minutes here.
  2. I have no business doing stuff other than homework, like right now when I have a huge project due tommorow, I shouldn’t even be here.
  3. I am browsing the forums from a computer other than my own, maybe it doesn’t have an IRC client, certain ports are blocked etc etc

As to the other staff idling on IRC, certainly they are free to do so, but it is not a requirement, if you need to get ahold of anyone send them a PM, I always read PMs first when I view the forums.[/quote]

I don’t think you should have to explain yourself to him

Read full topic

item.title: Staff contactability 2.0
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

frank_:

surely it is common sense that staff should appear in IRC? mopar often does, but is not always on irc when browsing the forums, which can be a tad irritating pwnd and the un-named are the only other staff to frequent IRC (though pwnd can be a tad aggro sometimes l0l)

There are a few reasons why I browse the forums while not joining IRC sometimes.

  1. My homepage is here, so while doing something else with firefox I will appear online for 15 minutes here.
  2. I have no business doing stuff other than homework, like right now when I have a huge project due tommorow, I shouldn’t even be here.
  3. I am browsing the forums from a computer other than my own, maybe it doesn’t have an IRC client, certain ports are blocked etc etc

As to the other staff idling on IRC, certainly they are free to do so, but it is not a requirement, if you need to get ahold of anyone send them a PM, I always read PMs first when I view the forums.

Read full topic
